name: Lid of a lidded sugar bowl
description: Lid of a lidded sugar bowl; Etienne-Henri Le Guay (French, 1719/1720 - about 1799), Sèvres Manufactory (French, 1756 - present); Sèvres, France; about 1765 - 1770; Soft-paste porcelain with polychrome enamelled decoration and gilding; 3.8 × 8.3 cm (1 1/2 × 3 1/4 in.); 89.DE.25.4.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Lid of a lidded sugar bowl
medium: Soft-paste porcelain with polychrome enamelled decoration and gilding
